# Eyes of the Avoral, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]], [[4th Level Druid Spells|Druid 4]], [[4th Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 4]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 7]], [[BoXM 7th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 7]], [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** 1 day/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** The Mage’s Tower website

The subject gains an avoral’s sharp eyesight, receiving a +1 per caster level (maximum +15) racial bonus on [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] checks for the duration of the spell. This bonus does not stack with that granted by the *[[Eyes of the Avoral (Spell)|eyes of the avoral]]* spell.

*Greater eyes of the avoral* can be made permanent with a *[[Permanency (Spell)|permanency]]* spell.
